© 2019. SimpleForm by Lucas Games.

  • Meet SimpleForms v.3.0

    Contact US

    We are here to help.

    Standard contact forms work just fine, but we can make them outstanding using SimpleForms.

    Simple Forms has been built with simplicity in mind and helps you build simple to manage and user friendly contact forms in no time. Version 3.0 is out and brings a lot of new features and improvements.

    Key Features:

    1. No Plugins, just Javascript! The only dependency is translations script where you can add translations for error/info strings
    2. Updated form design. Choose between default, classic and modern fields style
    3. Light, Dark and 6 more form color themes
    4. All configurations in one place. Now it's easier than ever to set up form validation, files uploading, captcha, redirect, accessibility and more
    5. Drag & drop files upload (multiple folders supported). Select or drop files to upload
    6. SMTP configuration ready. Just enter your email to receive form submissions
    7. New email templates. Now you can choose between default, minimal and modern email templates
    8. Google reCaptcha version 2 and version 3 available with simple configuration. Also mathematical captcha added
    9. Custom validation rules for your form which can be set up all in one place
    10. Responsive Design (Mobile first)
    11. Clean and minimal HTML/CSS/JS/PHP Code
    12. Support Strict JavaScript Mode("use strict";)
    13. Cross browser compatible
    14. Strong Validation (name, phone, email, date, url)
    15. Agree Before Submit Feature
    16. Store or Delete Uploaded Files
    17. Redirect to Success Page After Submit
    18. Server Side Fields Validation
    19. Server Side Files Validation
    20. Auto responder Feature
    21. User IP Localization
    22. Server JSON String Response
    23. Success/errors strings translation
    24. And more...

  • 1. Installation

    CSS Required Files

    Link into your page required css file: simple-forms/css/simple-forms.css

    JS Required Files

    1. simple-forms/js/simple-forms-translations.js
    2. simple-forms/js/simple-forms.min.js

    Example 

    <!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8"/>
    <title>Simple Ajax Contact Form</title>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no">

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="simple-forms/css/simple-forms.css">
</head>
<body>

    ...

    <script src="simple-forms/js/simple-forms-translations.js"></script>
    <script src="simple-forms/js/simple-forms.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

    After connecting required files, add your form.

    Simple Form HTML markup

    <!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8"/>
    <title>Simple Ajax Contact Form</title>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no">

    <!-- Simple Forms Styles -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="simple-forms/css/simple-forms.css">
</head>
<body>

<div class="sf-wrapper">
    <form id="contact-form" class="simple-form white default-style" action="simple-forms/sendmail.php" method="post">
        <div class="form-heading">
            <h4>Contact US</h4>
            <p>
                We are here to help.
            </p>
        </div>

        <div class="grid">
            <div class="grid-col-md-6">
                <label>
                    <input type="text" name="name" value="" class="validate-name" min="2" placeholder="Name*" required>
                </label>
            </div>
            <div class="grid-col-md-6">
                <label>
                    <input type="text" name="phone" class="validate-phone" placeholder="Phone*" required>
                </label>
            </div>
        </div>

        <label>
            <input type="text" name="email" class="validate-email" value="" placeholder="E-mail address*">
        </label>

        <label>
            <input type="text" name="url" class="validate-email" value="" placeholder="Social Profile">
        </label>

        <label>
            <input type="date" name="date" class="validate-email" value="" placeholder="Pick a date">
        </label>

        <label>
            <select name="subject" title="demo" required>
                <option value="">Choose subject</option>
                <option value="Support">Support</option>
                <option value="Offer">Special offer</option>
                <option value="Offer">Other</option>
            </select>
        </label>

        <label>
            <textarea name="message" placeholder="Write your message here ..." required></textarea>
        </label>

        <div class="simple-files">
            <label class="simple-file-label">
                <input type="file" name="files[]" multiple>
                <span class="simple-files-trigger"><strong>Select</strong> or drop files here.</span>
            </label>
        </div>

        <div class="form-submit text-center">
            <button type="submit">Send now</button>
        </div>

        <div class="consent">
            <label class="custom-checkbox-label">
                <input type="checkbox" class="simple-consent-checkbox" name="consent" value="agree" required="" checked>
                <span class="custom-checkbox-button"></span>

                By clicking the “Send now” button you agree to our <a href="#">Terms and Conditions</a>.
            </label>
        </div>

        <div class="server-response"></div>
    </form>
</div>

<!-- Simple Forms Core Files -->
<script src="simple-forms/js/simple-forms-translations.js"></script>
<script src="simple-forms/js/simple-forms.min.js"></script>

</body>
</html>

    IMPORTANT! Please make sure that form action attribute contain a valid path to sendmail.php (form handler) file.

    NOTE: For debugging open te browser console (F12 Key in Chrome/Mozilla/Internet Explorer OS Windows).

    NOTE: Sending emails to your inbox may not be delivered form local files in OS Windows. Consider testing the form on your hosting.

    Now we have the full featured form, white version, default style and we can test it! If all required files are properly connected CSS/JS/PHP our form should shine and send emails.

  • 2. Styling & Configuration

    Now it's time to customise your colors.

    Simple Forms comes in 8 different styles and YES you can customize form styling or add another with ease.

    NOTE: All css rules are available in: simple-forms/css/simple-forms.scss.
    Feel free to adjust your styles.

    Available Form Styles

    1. White
    2. Dark
    3. Fancy Purple (Gradient)
    4. Fresh Green (Gradient)
    5. Water Blue (Gradient)
    6. Shiny Red (Gradient)
    7. Faded Light
    8. Faded Dark

    Simple Forms comes with a lot of new and useful settings, all in one place. See comments bellow for description

    Simple Forms Settings: 

    <script>
var simple_forms = new SimpleForms("#contact-form", {
    action: "",                          // set form action attribute, default value: simple-forms/sendmail.php
    lang: "en",                          // language for error/info strings
    theme: "white",                      // form color theme, options: white | dark | purple | red | green | blue | faded-light | faded-dark
    fieldsStyle: "default",              // form fields style, options: default | classic | classic-rounded | modern | modern-rounded
    ajaxSubmit: true,                    // send form using AJAX (no page reload)
    validate: true,                      // enable form fields validation
    validateOnKeyup: true,               // validate form fields On KeyUp Event
    browserValidation: false,            // use browser validation
    tooltips: true,                      // show validation errors as tooltips, if false will show errors as strings bellow the field
    showErrors: true,                    // show validation errors
    debug: true,                         // enable debugging mode (will show errors in browser console)
    hideFormAfterSubmit: false,          // hide the form after submit
    customSuccessMessage: "",            // overwrite server response with a custom message
    formCSS: "",                         // add css styles to the form, example: box-shadow: none;
    files: {
        enabled: true,                   // enable files uploading
        extensions: "jpg jpeg svg png",  // allowed extensions
        min: 0,                          // min required files count
        max: 10,                         // max allowed files count
        maxFileSize: 24,                 // max file item size in MB
        filesUploadHandler: "",          // files upload handler, default: simple-forms/files-upload-handler.php
    },
    redirect: {
        enabled: false,                  // enable redirect after form submit
        url: "success.html",             // url to redirect to
        timeout: 3                       // redirect timeout (seconds), leave 0 for instant redirect
    },
    captcha: {
        enabled: true,                   // enable captcha
        type: "recaptcha-v3",            // set captcha type, options: math | recaptcha-v2 | recaptcha-v3
        siteKey: "",                     // recaptcha SITE KEY, generate here: https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create
        theme: "light"                   // recaptcha theme color, options: light | dark
    },
    accessibility: {
        escapeReset: true,               // press ESC key to reset/clear all form fields and files
        tabHighlight: false              // press tab to highlight form fields
    },
    consent: true,                       // enable submit button after consent checkbox is checked
    validator: {
        rules: {                        // add custom validation rules
            ".validate-name": {         // select form field with class .validate-name
                required: true,         // add required attribute to form field
                min: 2,                 // set field min attribute
                max: 30,                // set field max attribute
                name: true              // attach NAME validation
            },
            ".validate-phone": {
                required: true,
                min: 8,
                max: 14,
                phone: true              // attach PHONE validation
            },
            ".validate-email": {
                required: true,
                min: 8,
                email: true              // attach EMAIL validation
            },
            ".validate-url": {
                required: true,
                min: 5,
                url: true                // attach URL validation
            },
            ".validate-date": {
                required: true,
                min: 6,
                date: true               // attach DATE validation
            }
        }
    }
});

</script>

  • 3. Backend Configuration

    Backend Configuration (simple-forms/config.php)

    All available form handler options are described bellow. Everything you need to set up is probably described here. There is a minimum required setup to start receiving emails.

    Name Type Default Description
    COMPANY_NAME string Simple Forms Set your company/brand name (not required, but recommended)
    YOUR_EMAIL string empty * Required, your email address, example: my-email@gmail.com
    This email will receive form submissions.
    EMAILS_SUBJECT string New Form Submission * Required, email subject
    SEND_COPY_TO string empty Not required, comma separated emails which will get a copy:
    myemail@gmail.com, myemail2@gmail.com
    USE_RECAPTCHA boolean true Enable recaptcha check, this require RECAPTCHA_V2_SECRET_KEY or RECAPTCHA_V3_SECRET_KEY to be setup
    RECAPTCHA_V2_SECRET_KEY string empty Recaptcha version 2 secret key, generate here
    RECAPTCHA_V3_SECRET_KEY string empty Recaptcha version 3 secret key, generate here
    DELETE_FILES_AFTER_MAIL boolean true Choose to delete or keep uploaded files after receiving emails

  • 4. Captcha

    Simple Forms has three build in captcha options.

    1. Mathematical captcha
    2. Google reCaptcha version 2
    3. Google reCaptcha version 3

    Captcha configuration 

    var simple_forms = new SimpleForms("#contact-form", {
    captcha: {
        enabled: true,                   // enable captcha
        type: "recaptcha-v3",            // set captcha type, options: math | recaptcha-v2 | recaptcha-v3
        siteKey: "YOUR_SITE_KEY",        // recaptcha SITE KEY, generate here: https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create
        theme: "light"                   // recaptcha theme color, options: light | dark
    }
});

  • 5. Redirect

    Simple Forms has the option to redirect after form submission.

    Redirect configuration 

    var simple_forms = new SimpleForms("#contact-form", {
    redirect: {
        enabled: true,       // enable redirect after form submit
        url: "success.html", // url to redirect to
        timeout: 3           // redirect timeout (seconds), leave 0 for instant redirect
    }
});

  • 6. Drag & Drop Files

    Simple Forms come with a brand new solution for files uploading.
    Now you can drag and drop files (multiple folders supported).

    Files upload configuration 

    var simple_forms = new SimpleForms("#contact-form", {
    files: {
        enabled: true,                   // enable files uploading
        extensions: "jpg jpeg svg png",  // allowed extensions
        min: 0,                          // min required files count
        max: 10,                         // max allowed files count
        maxFileSize: 24,                 // max file item size in MB
        filesUploadHandler: "",          // files upload handler, default: simple-forms/files-upload-handler.php
    }
});

  • 7. Advanced Validation

    Simple Forms now allow you to add custom validation rules, see example bellow.

    Advanced form fields validation 

    var simple_forms = new SimpleForms("#contact-form", {
    validator: {
        rules: {                        // add custom validation rules
            ".validate-name": {         // select form field with class .validate-name
                required: true,         // add required attribute to form field
                min: 2,                 // set field min attribute
                max: 30,                // set field max attribute
                name: true              // attach NAME validation
            },
            ".validate-phone": {
                required: true,
                min: 8,
                max: 14,
                phone: true              // attach PHONE validation
            },
            ".validate-email": {
                required: true,
                min: 8,
                email: true              // attach EMAIL validation
            },
            ".validate-url": {
                required: true,
                min: 5,
                url: true                // attach URL validation
            },
            ".validate-date": {
                required: true,
                min: 6,
                date: true               // attach DATE validation
            }
        }
    }
});
